page.title: 09HEALTH IN LLANBRYNMAIR
page.content: Health in Llanbrynmair is good and we stay healthy because of the clean air. There is a doctor who comes weekly to hold a surgery for the people at the Community Centre.We also have a mother and baby clinic which is held in the Community Centre attended by health visitor and doctor once per month.We have two district nurses who visit sick people at their homes and also look after the elderly.The nearest hospital is at{Machynlleth}but more serious cases have to travel 30 miles to{Bronglais Hospital,Aberystwyth.}We have an ambulance service which comes from{Machynlleth}when we call it with accidents or emergencies.The health visitor comes once a term and also the school dentist and doctor once a year.The nearest public dentist is at {Machynlleth.
